data.message: Hi fb, I'm locked out of my acc. Long story short, my pw is irrecoverable because I took my number off of it. I'm using a friend's acc in the meantime. But I can prove the acc is me/ it's my identity. Can anyone help me with this? :( i don't have access to the email/security questions or even 3 friends. does that mean i cant use fb anymore?

replies.message: Hi Max. If you cannot regain access to your account using these methods, you may need to contact your email service provider in order to reset your password. For more information, please visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1gc84EI. -Rose
Good Luck with that Max. I m going through the same thing with PayPal. .
Max, they have a app in Google Play Store to recover your password it's on play store I did it and I recover mine try it
